channel.title: Correction to a773/quantizer.axh
channel.description: I'm running Axoloti patcher 1.0.12-2 under Fedora. The object a773/quantizer.axh skipped the note "b" when mapping a potentiometer value. I made a correction to the object on line 5, changing the 12 for an 11 corrects the issue of the missing b, and all notes are accesible now. for(int i=0; i<11; i++){ Hope it Helps. D.

item.title: Correction to a773/quantizer.axh
item.dc:creator: @DiegoLiedo
item.description:
@DiegoLiedo wrote:

I'm running Axoloti patcher 1.0.12-2 under Fedora.
The object a773/quantizer.axh skipped the note "b" when mapping a potentiometer value. I made a correction to the object on line 5, changing the 12 for an 11 corrects the issue of the missing b, and all notes are accesible now.
for(int i=0; i<11; i++){
Hope it Helps.
D.
